message: Ren is sleeping curled up on his favorite cushion in the corner.
Koujaku heads straight for the balcony, probably for a smoke.
I reach for the ashtray, but Koujaku suddenly stops and turns around.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Not gonna smoke?"

name: 紅雀
message: "I'm good for today."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah?"
Not in the mood?
I sit down on the bed, and Koujaku takes a seat next to me.
What's going on?
I thought he was going to start shooting the shit like he always does, but he just sits there, staring at his feet.
I look down, thinking there might be something wrong with the floor, but nope. Same as ever.
...Man, what is with this atmosphere? It's stifling.
I glance up at him as the awkward silence continues.
Am I just imagining it, or is he sitting farther away than usual?
I tell myself I'm overthinking it, but the more time passes, the more restless I become.
...Why isn't he saying anything?
Is he about to broach some really heavy subject?
I just wish he'd hurry up with it. The suspense is bad for my heart.
...Fine. If he's not gonna say something, I will.

name: 蒼葉
message: "H-Hey―"
Again, silence. That was awkward.

name: 紅雀
message: "Sorry. Go ahead."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh. Well, I, uh... You want something to drink?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Oh, no. I'm fine."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Okay."
Silence.
Now what?

name: 蒼葉
message: "...So, um, maybe I'm just imagining it or something, but aren't you sitting kinda far away?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Far away?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I mean... look."
I indicate the sizeable distance between the two of us.

name: 紅雀
message: "Huh? Oh. No reason."
What is this?
What... is this?
He's making me look like the weird one here.
...I've had enough.
I get up and reseat myself closer to Koujaku.
Koujaku greets me for some reason, then turns away.
Seriously, what the fuck is going on here?
Just as I'm starting to get angry, Koujaku mutters something under his breath.

name: 紅雀
message: "...Um, sorry."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"

name: 紅雀
message: "For everything..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh, no, it's fine... really."
Everything is so tense, not unlike the buildup to a fight. My heart is pounding. I want to run.
Suddenly, Koujaku looks at me. His expression is dead serious.

name: 紅雀
message: "...Mind if I talk about something?"

name: 紅雀
message: "It's about what happened in Platinum Jail, so I dunno. Maybe you don't wanna remember."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...It's fine."

name: 紅雀
message: "Okay."
Koujaku lets out a sigh of relief.
Honestly, I've been wanting to talk about that too.
So I sit there quietly, waiting for him to speak.

name: 紅雀
message: "So, after I found out Ryuuhou was there, I was ready to chase that bastard to the ends of the earth. But I also didn't want to drag anyone else into my shit."

name: 紅雀
message: "Not the guys, and not you. But... turns out I couldn't handle it on my own after all."

name: 紅雀
message: "And it's like, you know. Man, this is fucking embarrassing, but... remember how I said that when we were kids, your smile always gave me strength?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: 紅雀
message: "After I came back to the island and saw you again, I made a promise to myself: that I would never hurt anyone ever again, and also..."

name: 紅雀
message: "That no matter what, I'd always protect you. ...But I ended up betraying you instead. I still feel awful about it."
Koujaku looks at his feet. I, meanwhile, can't hide my surprise.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I never knew."

name: 紅雀
message: "Hm?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I never knew you felt that way about me."

name: 紅雀
message: "Well, of course you didn't. I never told you. I was never gonna tell you either."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I thought you were hiding things from me... Sorry, man. I was a real dick."

name: 紅雀
message: "Don't beat yourself up about that. We both know what was going on now."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah..."

<4line><voice name='紅雀' class='紅雀' src='voice/dm15/5000410a02'>
"And then, there was when you went into my head. When I try to remember it now, it feels kinda like a dream, but it made me remember what it was like back then."

name: 紅雀
message: "We would talk and play, even fight sometimes. We weren't together for all that long, but I wouldn't give those memories up for anything in the world."

name: 紅雀
message: "You had a dream about when we were kids too, right? Probably just a coincidence, but still, pretty cool, huh?"
Koujaku flashes his familiar smile. My cheeks loosen, following his lead.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I thought things'd be totally different now that we're grown-up, but nah. We're the same. Just like we were when we were kids."

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah, not a damn thing's changed, huh? We're still the same little shits we were back then."

name: 紅雀
message: "...So. I've been thinking about everything that's happened since I came back."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uh-huh."

name: 紅雀
message: "And, uh, I realized this whole time, I haven't been able to get you outta my head."

name: 紅雀
message: "...Um, I'm sure you don't even want to think about it, but remember when I lost my shit at Glitter?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: 紅雀
message: "I barely remember what happened, and I feel really bad about that, but... there was one thing that stuck with me."

name: 紅雀
message: "I remember thinking... I didn't want it to be like that. I didn't want to... touch you like that."

name: 紅雀
message: "I mean, I'm normally attracted to women. I like women. I shouldn't want to touch you at all, but like..."
Koujaku fiddles with his bangs and looks away. His ears are starting to get a little red.
Man... now I'm getting embarrassed.

name: 紅雀
message: "I've always thought of you as my best bro. I figured that's why I sometimes lose my shit over you."

name: 紅雀
message: "But ever since Platinum Jail... right up to this very moment, all I've been able to think about is you."

name: 紅雀
message: "And like, so this happened a little before that, but... that time you fell asleep listening to music? You probably didn't notice... but I walked in on you."

name: 紅雀
message: "The way you looked, sleeping there... I couldn't get it out of my head. ...Okay, now don't get mad at what I'm about to say."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...What?"

name: 紅雀
message: "I guess I thought you looked kinda... hot."

name: 紅雀
message: "It's weird to think about your bro like that, huh?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...What about girls? You're not fooling around anymore?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Not since we got back. Haven't felt like it at all."
How am I supposed to respond?

name: 紅雀
message: "...To be honest, I think I figured it out a while ago. I've just... been avoiding it. Trying to pretend I didn't notice."

name: 紅雀
message: "We're both guys, and bros, too... I couldn't believe it, so I did my best to ignore the feelings. But it didn't work. They kept coming back."

name: 紅雀
message: "I guess that means my feelings are so strong, nothing can get rid of them."
Koujaku is still looking away. By now, his ears have turned bright red.
...Shit, what do I do?
Things are getting really weird.
And I'm pretty sure I know where it's going...

name: 紅雀
message: "...And, uh."
When Koujaku slides his hand over mine, my heart practically leaps from my throat.

name: 紅雀
message: "I guess I, uh... I think I'm in love with you."
My ears and face are probably just as red as Koujaku's. I can feel heat rising from my toes to my head.
Koujaku grasps my hand and squeezes tightly.

name: 紅雀
message: "...I love you."

name: 紅雀
message: "I've loved you ever since we were kids."
A wave of emotion crests inside me, and I let out a shuddering gasp.
What do I do? My chest is so tight, I can hardly breathe.

name: 紅雀
message: "...What about you?"

name: 紅雀
message: "How do you feel about me?"
I run my tongue over parched lips.
How do I feel about Koujaku?
Is he my best friend? Just someone I like hanging out with?
While Koujaku was talking, I reached a conclusion of my own.
My heart wouldn't be racing like this if I hadn't.
My face... wouldn't be burning like this if I hadn't.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Me too."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I feel the same way. I think."

name: 紅雀
message: "You do?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I've always thought of you as a friend. My best friend, even. But somewhere along the line, it changed. I think... the same way it changed for you..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I think I might love you too."

name: 紅雀
message: "...Aoba."
He pulls my hand closer, and suddenly his face is inches from mine.
I close my eyes... and then our lips touch.
An electric sensation courses through my body.
If there's a line, we just stepped over it. Our relationship has changed.
Now... things will be different.
